attributes.action: CREATE A PUBLICLY FUNDED SCHEME THAT ALLOWS CITIZENS TO SUE EACH OTHER OVER SLANDER, LIBEL OR DEFAMATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am calling on the Government to fund a scheme to allow any citizen to sue any other citizen or organisations for defamation, slander or libel. There should be complete freedom of speech in the UK. But there should also be affordable rights of defence for all citizens. This funding scheme will provide this.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters in the main sentence.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
